ssGUI::​ImageData
ssGUI::​ImageData

If you are using LoadRawFromMemory, remember to reload it again if there's any changes to the image memory.

Variables & Constructor
protected:
    ssGUI::Backend::BackendImageInterface* BackendImage;                        //See <GetBackendImageInterface>
    std::vector<std::function<void(ssGUI::ImageData*)>> DataChangedCallbacks;   //See <AddDataChangedCallback>
    std::vector<bool> DataChangedCallbacksValid;                                //See <AddDataChangedCallback>
ImageData::ImageData() :    BackendImage(nullptr),
                            DataChangedCallbacks(),
                            DataChangedCallbacksValid()
{
    BackendImage = ssGUI::Backend::BackendFactory::CreateBackendImageInterface();
}
Functions
GetBackendImageInterface
virtual ssGUI::Backend::BackendImageInterface* GetBackendImageInterface() const

Gets the pointer of the BackendImageInterface

IsValid
virtual bool IsValid() const

See <BackendImageInterface::IsValid>

AddDataChangedCallback
virtual int AddDataChangedCallback(
std::function<void(ssGUI::ImageData*)> callback
)

Adds a callback function when the image data is changed.  Note that this can't capture data change if BackendImageInterface function is called or if the image data is directly modified from the pointer without calling NotifyImageDataChange.

RemoveDataChangedCallback
virtual void RemoveDataChangedCallback(
int id
)

Removes the callback function when the image data is changed

NotifyImageDataChange
virtual void NotifyImageDataChange()

Notifies that the image data has changed.

LoadFromPath
virtual bool LoadFromPath(
std::string path
)

See ssGUI::Backend::BackendImageInterface::LoadFromPath

LoadImgFileFromMemory
virtual bool LoadImgFileFromMemory(
void const * dataPtr,
std::size_t size
)

LoadRawFromMemory
bool LoadRawFromMemory(
void const * dataPtr,
ssGUI::ImageFormat format,
glm::ivec2 imageSize
)

See ssGUI::Backend::BackendImageInterface::LoadRawFromMemory

GetSize
virtual glm::ivec2 GetSize() const

See ssGUI::Backend::BackendImageInterface::GetSize

UpdateCache
virtual void UpdateCache()

See ssGUI::Backend::BackendImageInterface::UpdateCache

Clone
virtual ImageData* Clone(
bool copyCallbacks
)

Clones this ImageData object. Use this function instead of assignment operator or copy constructor.  If copyCallbacks is true, then all the image data changed callbacks will be copied.
